data.eml:eml: A new species of Amazophrynella (Anura: Bufonidae) from southern Amazonia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ávila, Robson W., Carvalho, Vinicius T., Gordo, Marcelo, Kawashita-Ribeiro, Ricardo A., Morais, Drausio H. (2012): A new species of Amazophrynella (Anura: Bufonidae) from southern Amazonia. Zootaxa 3484: 65-74, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.209500
